pageContext.claim: “Do we have any Cubans here? I was given last time the Bay of Pigs award, Bay of Pigs award.”
pageContext.analysis: The "Bay of Pigs award" does not exist. The Bay of Pigs Brigade 2506 veteran group, based in Miami, endorsed Trump in 2016 and gave him a framed emblem. Trump also often claims he won the "Michigan man of the year award," which also does not exist.
